div.p: This article is available at the URI http://dlib.nyu.edu/awdl/isaw/isaw-papers/1/ as part of the NYU Library's Ancient World Digital Library in partnership with the Institute for the Study of the Ancient World (ISAW). More information about ISAW Papers is available on the ISAW website. Please note that while the content of this article will not change, its appearance and interaction with other resources will develop over time. Additionally, links to third-party sites have been added as part of the editorial process and do not imply the endorsement of the authors.
